name: Fiskur
description:
You play as a Viking who's ship has crashed on an unmarked island in Scandinavia. Fitted with only your fishing rod, you set out to catch fish and survive the wreckage. After wandering around the island for a short time, you discover an altar deep within the island dedicated to Njord, God of the Sea. Offering some of your bounty to Njord, he aids you by turning your rod into a weapon capable of surviving the terrors of the night to come...

Read more about Fiskur at https://castirongames2020.gitlab.io/
